author: Staff Reporter
text:
One killed, four injured in accident

A 33-year-old man was killed and four others injured in a car-lorry collision on Friday. The victim Raji, along with his wife and four other relatives were heading to Palacodde for a condolence, when the car rammed a lorry in the rear. The front portion of the car was crushed, grievously injuring the passengers.

The victims were rushed to Dharmapuri government hospital, where Raji succumbed to injuries.

Fatally knocked

down

A 63-year-old Bengaluru man was fatally knocked down, when he attempted to cross the road along Krishnagiri - Hosur national highway on Saturday.

The victim Ashok Kumar of MRP Road in Bengaluru was returning from visiting a relative in Salem in his car. According to the police, the victim on his return, had parked his car by the side of the road for taking rest and had attempted to cross the road, when a speeding car fatally knocked him down.
title: Killed in accident
